title: Armament Guide
content: - ARMAMENTS GUIDE - Hi Warriors, ADD THIS MAIL TO FAVORITES! What Are Armaments? Armaments are formation-specific gear for your primary commander. Each march can equip 4 pieces that match the formation type. They add stats like %Attack, %Defense, and %Health. Attributes & Tiers Armaments come in 3 tiers: Elite, Epic, Legendary. Higher tiers roll stronger attributes. Legendary stats range roughly from 1.5%–3.5% depending on type. Each piece has 3 unique attribute lines — duplicate stat lines don't appear. Inscriptions Armaments can include inscriptions, giving extra buffs. Epic armaments can have 1 inscription, Legendary up to 2. Inscriptions can be Common, Rare, or Special, and their chances vary by tier. How to Obtain Earn armaments from Travel & Dispatch, Recycling, or bundles. You can re-roll attributes using the Transmutation system. Tips • Focus on stats for your main troop type (Infantry, Cavalry, Archers). • Fill all 4 slots first, then improve stats over time. • Rally and garrison players should aim for high rolls and inscriptions. • Don't worry about perfection early — build balance before optimization. Stay patient, plan upgrades wisely, and your formations will grow stronger every day!
